sponsor: Johnson & Johnson Pharmaceutical Research & Development, L.L.C.
briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate Long-Term Safety of Multiple Doses of Tapentadol (CG5503) Prolonged-Release (PR) and Oxycodone Controlled-Release (CR) in Patients With Chronic Pain
officialTitle: A One-Year, Randomized, Open-Label, Parallel-Arm, Phase 3 Long-Term Safety Trial, With Controlled Adjustment of Dose, of Multiple Doses of CG5503 PR and Oxycodone CR in Subjects With Chronic Pain
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety profile of tapentadol (CG5503) PR at doses of 100 mg - 250 mg administered twice daily over a maximum one year period to patients with at least a 3-month history of low back pain, or pain caused by knee or hip osteoarthritis.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Treatment-emergent Adverse Events (TEAE)
